events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident that occurred at an intersection last night, involving another vehicle.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under auto accident due to keywords indicating a vehicle collision incident.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned promptly to handle this customer's case.
Acknowledgment message sent to the customer confirming receipt and understanding of the auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and witness statements to further process the claim efficiently.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and detailed images of the damaged vehicle.
Initiated claim investigation with accident reconstruction experts to assess fault and damage extent.
Completed thorough investigation confirming the customer's vehicle was damaged due to the other driver's negligence.
Proposed a fair settlement amount covering full repair costs and rental car reimbursement for the claim.
Received positive feedback from the customer appreciating the quick and transparent handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager authorizing the settlement payment to be processed.
Issued payment to the customer covering approved settlement amount including vehicle repair and rental fees.
Claim officially closed after confirming customer satisfaction and completion of all payments related to the accident.
